name: 7'scarlet
description: The remote town of Okunezato is shaped like a crescent moon and shrouded in dark myths and legends. Take on the role of a brave young woman journeying into the unknown to uncover dangerous truths and locate her missing brother with her childhood friend.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: Intel Celeron G3900 or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0-compliant graphic card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX-compliant
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 (64bit) or higher Processor: Intel Core i5-6500 or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0-compliant graphic card with 1024 MB VRAM or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX-compliant
